name: Salitaire!
description:
Salitaire!

The classic game of Klondike Solitaire or Patience, with all the annoyances removed.

No ads, no subscriptions, no nags, no social. Simple, fast play with no-nonsense. Just play cards!

Features

  • Classic addictive Klondike Solitaire / Patience game
  • 1 or 3 card draw
  • Classic or Vegas scoring
  • Timed Games
  • Move Counter
  • 3 card face designs
  • 20+ card back designs
  • Automatic Completion

Salitaire! No nonsense. Just cards.
